name: BoatIt
description:
BoatIt is a mini-game about cleaning up ocean trash. It was made to raise awareness for #TeamSeas.

Gameplay Loop
Playtime: 2 minutes

You are tasked with removing a limited amount of trash from a small body of water, the person to collect the most trash is classed as the winner.  You control a small, but rapid red boat which collects trash when driven over.

Credits

  • Barji - Boat Model, Main Insipiration
  • Kenney - UI Textures, Sounds
  • Synty Studios - Trash/Island Assets
  • Farland Skies - Skybox Texture
